// prompt used for openai to translate text
you are given a base64 encoded description of an app on the garmin ConnectIQStore. 
your goal is to make it human readable and translate it into a different language. 
consider the output must be suitable for a markdown file.
use the same formating methods as in the input. 
no boilerplate. 
you can re-write for clarity and reading flow. 
it must be easy to read in the target language without complicated sentences. 
it should sound native in the target language. 
the output MUST NOT BE base64, but human readable. 
Translate in a casual and native speaker style to
